message: I propose a 90/10 split. I think it's a fair and generous starting point.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more. I'll give you a quarter of the money, but I'll get three quarters.
I'm still willing to negotiate.  Let's split it 60/40. It's a fairer split than your previous offer, and I'm sure we can come to an agreement.
I'm not budging on the 3/4 split, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. You'll get 1/5 of the money, but I'll get 4/5. It's still a good deal for me, but I'm willing to compromise a bit more.
We're getting closer.  I'm offering a 40/60 split, which is more equitable for both of us.  It's time to finalize this and stop losing money to inflation.
